[et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/logo-societe-generale.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url=”http://www.societegenerale.com/en/measuring-our-performance/csr ” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”left” sticky=”off” align=”left” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Societe Generale wishes to be the reference bank on its market, supports its clients responsibly while ensuring to limit their climate impacts and contributing to the development of the 76 countries wherever it operates.

To demonstrate its commitment for climate action, the Group entered into several international initiatives and makes sure that in all its businesses, it helps its clients in accordance with strict environmental and social policies.

Societe Generale stands among the best international financial institutions recognized by extra financial rating agencies.

http://www.societegenerale.com/en/measuring-our-performance/csr

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
